description: Introduction:This LCD Screen protector fit for CANON 5D III digital camera. It is made of 0.5mm optical glass to provide the highest protection for your valuable cameras.This protector get over 95% transparent rate, to show the clear image of the LCD screen. The hardness of the surface is 8-9H, and support up to 4KG/m^2, highly resist to scratches and shock.It also protects the LCD screen away from UV light.Features:Optical glass screen protector makes it stronger and scratch proofANTI-EXPLOSION makes the glass protector harmlessPC FRAME brings outstanding reinforcement and featureIt is made of 6 protection layers :1. Protection layer,2. Coating layer,3. Transparent layer,4. Colour layer,5. mount layer,6. clinging layer.Specifications:Made of intensified optical glass materials with anti-explosion layer.Material:Optical glass,PC,Anti-explosion filmThickness:0.5mm glass,0.75mm PC frameImpact resistance:12kg/cmNo trimming required, fit directly on your LCD screen. Just clean your LCD screen first, peel off the white back of the protector to stick, Done! Easy to install and bubbles free, unlike plastic protector which always gives you bubbles between the protector and the screen. No adhesive backing at the LCD screen, only at the border of the film for clearness. Can be removed and reinstall, without leaving ugly residual on your LCD screen. Use a thin plastic business card or similar item (the plastic package of this protector could be used as the tool) to slide around the edge of the screen to remove it. Do not pull or use fingernails to lift the four corners of the screen protector as it may break the glass protector, hurt your fingers and/or damage the camera.Package includes:GGS BF Model Main LCD screen protector  x1GGS BF Model info LCD screen protector x1(Original Manufactory Package)
title: GGS LCD Screen Protector optical glass for Canon 5D Mark III Main LCD , Info LCD
